data.title: Resident Magazine - VOL 36 | ISSUE 7 | Winter 2023 - David Martin
data.meta_description:
Unveiling the Winter Edition of RESIDENT: A Celebration of Luxury, Style, and Innovation
As the winter winds whisper the tales of festive cheer and...
data.text: Unveiling the Winter Edition of RESIDENT: A Celebration of Luxury, Style, and Innovation As the winter winds whisper the tales of festive cheer and sparkling snowflakes, we at RESIDENT are thrilled to present our much-anticipated Luxury Home and Real Estate Issue. In this edition, we navigate the realms of opulence and elegance, bringing you exclusive insights and breathtaking trends from around the globe. Dazzling Developments: Terra's Visionary Path with David Martin Sustainable Luxury: A New Era in The Hamptons, an in-depth conversation with Hezi Mena and Stefano Braganti of DEUNA HOLDINGS Unlocking the Secrets of Wealth with Grant Cardone Timekeeping Elegance: AVI & CO.’s New Chapter NYC’s Hidden Gems: Where to Stay and Dine Milan's Fashion Majestique and much more... This winter, let RESIDENT guide you through a world where luxury, style, and innovation converge. Each story is a testament to the beauty of living a life adorned with the finest experiences. Welcome to our winter wonderland of grandeur.
